title: Christian Education: Between the Table and the T-shirt with Brett Salkeld and Kale Zelden
description:
Brett and Kale are back. Brett is working on a book about Christian Education and was told he should check out what the Dutch Calvinists had written about it. So we compared a few notes. As always with these two things move fast. 

Sacramento Catholic School kicks out children of "Only Fan" mom https://people.com/human-interest/mom-who-makes-150k-a-month-from-onlyfans-says-catholic-school-expelled-her-3-kids/

https://churchlifejournal.nd.edu/articles/the-question-of-gender-is-first-and-foremost-a-metaphysical-question

https://www.ncronline.org/news/opinion/barrons-beige-catholicism-erases-years-racial-social-justice-activism

Calvin University Chimes https://calvinchimes.org/2021/03/11/anti-lgbtq-tabling-event-sparks-outrage-organizers-applied-as-apologetics-event/

https://twitter.com/james_ka_smith/status/1369679067440685059

Pope Francis Encyclical http://www.vatican.va/content/francesco/en/encyclicals/documents/papa-francesco_20201003_enciclica-fratelli-tutti.html

CRCNA Human Sexuality Report https://www.crcna.org/sites/default/files/human_sexuality_interim_report_2019.pdf
